DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Increases damage received by #b10% per stack. NL Receiving attack damage reduces #yIchor by #b2.
Constricted enemies take damage at the end of their turn.
Added effect only happens when this card kills an enemy.
Any Damage and Block values on this card are equal to the number of cards in your hand fewer than the maximum.
Any Damage and Block values on this card are equal to the number of cards in your hand fewer than the maximum times two.
Any Damage and Block values on this card are equal to the number of cards in your hand fewer than the maximum times three.
Any Damage and Block values on this card are equal to the number of cards in your hand fewer than the maximum times four.
Any Damage and Block values on this card are equal to the number of cards in your hand fewer than the maximum times five.
Unplayable card with an effect that triggers when this is in your discard pile at the start of your turn.
At the end of your turn, gain this amount of block. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces #yPlated #yArmor by #b1.
The next time you take #yAttack damage, deal damage back.
When retained increase the value(s) on this card.
When exhausted, add a copy of this card to your discard pile.
